title: Govt purchases, productivity gains affect ADAS

content.question: The aggregate supply and aggregate demand graph above shows the current macroeconomic equilibrium of an economy. How will the price level and real output change if there is a sharp increase in productivity and a simultaneous increase in government purchases?

choices.label: Price Level Real Output Increase Increase
Price Level Real Output Increase Decrease
Price Level Real Output Indeterminate Increase
Price Level Real Output Indeterminate Decrease
Price Level Real Output Indeterminate Indeterminate

content.answer: Price Level Real Output Indeterminate Increase

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
